title: Nick Thomas-Symonds – 2020 Comments on Priti Patel Bullying Report
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nick Thomas-Symonds, the Shadow Home Secretary, on 11 November 2020.
content:
It is a disgrace that the report into allegations of bullying against the Home Secretary is being suppressed.
